summary:
InterRecruitment is an international Recruitment company covering all aspects of IT, from sales professionals to software development.

We have been working for the IT industry since 1982, finding the right people for our clients, and building over 25 years of experience in our chosen field. 

We cover western Europe from our 4 offices in The Netherlands, Belgium, France, Spain and Andorra where our Consultants work daily to match the demands of client with the skills of the candidates, and enlarging our field of coverage to the whole planet via a worldwide chain of recruitment companies throughout Europe, North- and South America, Asia and Australia. 

We understand that our clients are looking for highly motivated professionals, dedicated professionals who have clear ideas about their future. Our experience has proven us to know the market as no one knows it, and be able to find an ideal match for our companies and candidates. 

Through our contacts we are frequently asked for assignments for Start-Up companies, and have grown to successfully complete for all kind of job-hunting assignments, such as CEOs, CTOs, General Managers, Country Managers, Sales Managers, Sales Account Mangers, IT Managers, Project leaders, Pre- and Post Sales Consultants, Business Consultants and Technical Consultants. 

If you are interested in a job, please mail us, or just give us a call. Also if you are job-hunting and don't see what you're looking for, give us a ring. Our Consultants will be happy to help you.

Specialties: InterRecruitment is an international Recruitment company covering all aspects of IT, from sales professionals to software development.
